statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -27 \\ -14 \\ -5 \\ -23 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 78 \\ 39 \\ 13 \\ 65 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
